Description: Copper alloy weight; square, with face in form of lead insert, cast in low relief on the face with a square frame divided by a horizontal line; upper part, four columns supporting three triangular arches, figure, imperial bust and inscription; lower part, arch, two columns within which is denominational mark; on base is a lead plug.
Bibliographic references: Entwistle 2008 / A Catalogue of the Late Roman and Byzantine Weights and Weighing Equipment in the British Museum (91)
